quote: They will take possession of the Negʹeb and the mountainous region of Eʹsau, Of the She·pheʹlah and the land of the Phi·lisʹtines. They will take possession of the field of Eʹphra·im and the field of Sa·marʹi·a, And Benjamin will take possession of Gilʹe·ad.
I, Paul, am writing with my own hand: I will pay it back—not to mention that you owe me even your own self.
These are the ones who cause divisions, animalistic men, not having spirituality.
